column4: hi.what can i do with ssh port forwarding? a simple description actually i have read wikis and .. mybe with an example!
Among other things, you can jump across cliffs and scale the Empire State Building
thanks for your clear description! i just forgot it!

If you have say five machines between a router, all you have to do is forward a single port to a machine running sshd, and then you can do port forwarding to access any ports on any other machine behind that router
